rows.label: soul10_P0101
rows.name:
Okay, it's on! Close in
and start pounding!

rows.label: soul10_P0102
rows.name:
I'll take the lead! You stagger
them with melee attacks!

rows.label: soul10_P0103
rows.name:
Use melee attacks!
Let's get pumped!

rows.label: soul10_P0201
rows.name: Open fire and blast 'em!

rows.label: soul10_P0202
rows.name:
Don't forget to buff up!
It's the law!

rows.label: soul10_P0203
rows.name:
I think they flinched.
Time to really weaken 'em!

rows.label: soul10_P0301
rows.name:
Is this our chance?
Our chance to MOVE IN?

rows.label: soul10_P0302
rows.name:
I'm good to go!
Let's mow 'em down!

rows.label: soul10_P0303
rows.name:
Hey, don't wait for THEM
to beat US! Auras up!

rows.label: soul10_P0401
rows.name:
Doesn't anyone love me
enough to heal me?

rows.label: soul10_P0402
rows.name: Tighten those defenses! C'mon!

rows.label: soul10_P0403
rows.name:
I'm kind of losing it here.
How about a little inspiration?

rows.label: soul10_P0501
rows.name:
Crap! ...As in "crap,
please heal me!"

rows.label: soul10_P0502
rows.name:
Everything's going dark!
M-Mommy?

rows.label: soul10_P0503
rows.name:
You can help me later!
Buff up your resistances!

rows.label: soul10_P0601
rows.name:
You can still...make it...
Strike now...

rows.label: soul10_P0602
rows.name:
I think I...distracted them.
Shoot now!

rows.label: soul10_P0603
rows.name:
Use an aura so my sacrifice...
isn't in vain!

rows.label: soul10_P0701
rows.name:
Bet they're seeing stars now!
Close in!

rows.label: soul10_P0702
rows.name:
Booyah, grandma!
Follow up with gunfire!

rows.label: soul10_P0703
rows.name:
That had to sting!
Cripple 'em!

rows.label: soul10_P0801
rows.name:
They don't build 'em like they used
to. Finish 'em with a melee hit!

rows.label: soul10_P0802
rows.name:
Appendage destroyed! Shoot
while they're still crying about it!

rows.label: soul10_P0803
rows.name:
Oh, did that hurt? In that case,
we'll weaken you so ya die faster!

rows.label: soul10_P0901
rows.name:
They might be bigger, but we
look cooler holding guns!

rows.label: soul10_P0902
rows.name:
Hey, don't step on me just 'cause
you're angry! We'd better buff up!

rows.label: soul10_P0903
rows.name:
The rest is easy.
Overdrive time!

rows.label: soul10_P1001
rows.name:
Yeah! Now you can waltz
right up to them!

rows.label: soul10_P1002
rows.name: So predictable. Open fire!

rows.label: soul10_P1003
rows.name:
Now you can cripple them! I
totally deserve a cookie for this.

rows.label: soul10_P1101
rows.name:
This works great!
You gotta get your aura on!

rows.label: soul10_P1102
rows.name:
Oh baby. You gotta try
this aura thing!

rows.label: soul10_P1103
rows.name:
Let's make this OUR fight.
Buff up!

rows.label: soul10_P1201
rows.name:
Enough of this screwing
around. Overdrive!

rows.label: soul10_P1202
rows.name:
You're done hurting people!
Overdrive!

rows.label: soul10_P1203
rows.name:
We need an advantage!
Use an aura!

rows.label: soul10_C0101
rows.name: Who's next? Step right up!

rows.label: soul10_C0102
rows.name:
Ha ha! Bullet sandwiches
are FREE today!

rows.label: soul10_C0103
rows.name:
Holy crap, I got 'em! How about
rewarding me with a little boost?

rows.label: soul10_C0201
rows.name:
Not even a scratch!
Aura time!

rows.label: soul10_C0202
rows.name:
Ha! You can't get me! Buff up
and they can't touch you!

rows.label: soul10_C0203
rows.name:
I'll distract them! You shock
'em with a round or two!

rows.label: soul10_C0301
rows.name:
Whoa, that was lucky.
Gimme some cover fire!

rows.label: soul10_C0302
rows.name:
Am I amazing or what? Hey!
Don't point that thing at ME!

rows.label: soul10_C0303
rows.name:
Let's blast these guys today so we
can take a vacation tomorrow.

rows.label: soul10_C0401
rows.name:
What's with this weather?
Get us buffed up!

rows.label: soul10_C0402
rows.name:
This weather sucks AND
blows. Get your auras up!

rows.label: soul10_C0403
rows.name:
The enemy's dealing with this too.
Weaken 'em so they really suffer!

rows.label: soul10_C0501
rows.name:
Check out the dashing dasher! My
sense of humor could use a buff...

rows.label: soul10_C0502
rows.name:
Hey, go ahead and buff up
while I tear up the landscape!

rows.label: soul10_C0503
rows.name:
Hey, over here, loser!
Now! Use Overdrive now!

rows.label: soul10_C0601
rows.name:
You read my mind. Now go
smack 'em around some more!

rows.label: soul10_C0602
rows.name:
Well, bless your little heart.
...And put a bullet in theirs!

rows.label: soul10_C0603
rows.name:
Gosh, you saved me!
You deserve an aura!

rows.label: soul10_C0701
rows.name:
You're just what I needed,
babe. Well, you and a buff!

rows.label: soul10_C0702
rows.name:
Hey, how about a buff next?
I'll love you forever!

rows.label: soul10_C0703
rows.name:
Thanks for the help!
Let's break out those auras!

rows.label: soul10_C0801
rows.name: Let's turn the tables. Melee!

rows.label: soul10_C0802
rows.name:
We need to finish this now!
Gunfire!

rows.label: soul10_C0803
rows.name:
NO! I'm too young and pretty
to die! Gimme a boost!

rows.label: soul10_C0901
rows.name:
I'll draw their attention from
above while you shoot!

rows.label: soul10_C0902
rows.name:
Hey, I'm up here, dummy!
Now! Attack at range!

rows.label: soul10_C0903
rows.name:
Hey, dumbass! You ready
to get gunned down?

rows.label: soul10_C1001
rows.name:
Tumble tumble,
now we rumble!

rows.label: soul10_C1002
rows.name:
Shoot 'em now before
they get up!

rows.label: soul10_C1003
rows.name:
How's the ground? Comfy?
Let's weaken this klutz!

rows.label: soul10_C1101
rows.name:
Don't you hate it when you can't
move and someone PUSHES you?!

rows.label: soul10_C1102
rows.name:
What's the matter?
Can't fight back? Great!

rows.label: soul10_C1103
rows.name:
They're not moving!
Cripple them now!

rows.label: soul10_C1201
rows.name:
Shhh. Baby's sleeping.
Let's close in for a lullaby!

rows.label: soul10_C1202
rows.name:
Think they need an alarm clock.
Or a couple rounds to the dome!

rows.label: soul10_C1203
rows.name:
Their sweet dreams are about
to go up in flames!

rows.label: soul10_C1301
rows.name: I'll hold them. Start swinging!

rows.label: soul10_C1302
rows.name:
I've got 'em! Just don't
shoot ME, okay?!

rows.label: soul10_C1303
rows.name:
Bad enemy! Very bad! We
better make sure they behave!

rows.label: soul10_C1401
rows.name:
My Skell! Patch me up!
Please...?

rows.label: soul10_C1402
rows.name:
How dare you bust up my Skell!
My pals are gonna kill ya for that!

rows.label: soul10_C1403
rows.name:
Only thing hurt here is my
pride. Shoot this jerk!

rows.label: soul10_C1501
rows.name:
Oh crap! I need help!
Like, the miracle variety!

rows.label: soul10_C1502
rows.name:
Oh man, I am in deep
doo-doo here! Buff me up!

rows.label: soul10_C1503
rows.name:
We can't afford to be losing
Skells... Counter with Overdrive!

rows.label: soul10_C1601
rows.name:
Fuel's running low!
I need a re-up!

rows.label: soul10_C1602
rows.name:
Patch this thing up before
it conks out on me!

rows.label: soul10_C1603
rows.name:
I'm almost out of fuel!
I need help now!
